description: Retention of four Air Source Heat Pumps and balustrade at roof level,  to provide new roof terrace and Solar Panels and green roof.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-201a8b94-7fff-32a8-29c8-073ea6e1b57e"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed roof terrace would result in a loss of privacy through the overlooking of adjoining occupiers. As such the proposal is contrary to policy LP2 (Development and Amenity) of the Hackney Local Plan 2033; and Hackney's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a1e78b50-7fff-7726-3141-f31527ab5f87"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-09db6240-7fff-7d46-3ed6-aeb0d5c4d671"><span style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The heat pumps, by reason of their number and location at roof level, would result in incongruous additions that would add clutter to the roof and would be harmful to the visual amenities of the street scene and the terrace it forms part of. </span></span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">As such, the proposal is contrary to policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character), LP4 (Non-Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan LP33, policies D4 (Delivering good design)and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021 and the 2009 </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD 2009.</span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-403c20d7-7fff-f574-b442-919fd732b52c"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The substantial loss of the green roof would result in a loss of </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">biodiversity at the site and would </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">be contrary to policy LP47 (</span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Biodiversity and Sites of Importance of Nature Conservation) of Hackney's Local Plan LP33 (2020) and policy G6 (Biodiversity And access to nature) of the London Plan (2021).</span></span><br></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-9318163c-7fff-2013-47cd-e49cd4aa59a8"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The&nbsp;</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">railings by reason of their design, appearance, and location, are incongruous and visually harmful additions to the host building. The roof terrace itself and the associated railings are not typical features of the host building and the surrounding properties and would therefore be out of character with the pattern of development in the area and would have a harmful effect on the street scene. </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">As such the proposal is contrary to policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">LP4 (Non-Designated</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> Heritage Assets)</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">of the LP33 Hackney Local Plan 2020 and policies</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;D4 (</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Delivering good </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">design)</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021 and Hackney Residential Extensions</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">and Alterations SPD 2009</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">.</span></p>
